title.zh: 武汉：全国大学生统计建模大赛校级初赛入围
title.en: Wuhan: National College Student Statistical Modeling Competition Campus Preliminary Qualified

description.zh: 由华中科技大学学生左钰洁（数学与统计学院）、张梓润（生命科学与技术学院中法班）、顾宇涵（生命科学与技术学院生物医学工程专业）合作完成的论文《数据驱动的女性血友病杂合子的因果推断与出血风险预测》在全国大学生统计建模大赛校级初赛成功入围。这项研究将统计学方法应用于血友病女性群体研究，具有重要的学术价值。
description.en: The paper 'Data-Driven Causal Inference and Bleeding Risk Prediction for Female Hemophilia Heterozygotes' completed by HUST students Yujie (Ruby) Zuo (School of Mathematics and Statistics), Zhang Zirun (Sino-French Class, School of Life Science and Technology), and Gu Yuhan (Biomedical Engineering, School of Life Science and Technology) successfully qualified for the campus preliminary of the National College Student Statistical Modeling Competition. This research applies statistical methods to the study of female hemophilia groups, having important academic value.
